TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResXResourceWriter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Resources.IResourceWriter
Public Class ResXResourceWriter Implements IDisposable, IResourceWriter
public ref class ResXResourceWriter : IDisposable, System::Resources::IResourceWriter
type ResXResourceWriter = class interface IResourceWriter interface IDisposable

summary.span: 将资源写入 XML 资源 (.resx) 文件或输出流。

span.span: Writes resources in an XML resource (.resx) file or an output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将资源写入 XML 格式。The writes resources in XML format. 若要编写的二进制资源文件，使用。To write a binary resource file, use . 作为使用名称/值对指定资源方法。Resources are specified as name/value pairs using the method. 资源名称是区分大小写时用于查找;但若要将更轻松地支持创作工具，并帮助消除 bug，不允许一个.resx 文件具有仅大小写的名称。Resource names are case-sensitive when used for lookups; but to more easily support authoring tools and help eliminate bugs, does not allow a.resx file to have names that vary only by case. 若要创建一个.resx 文件，创建唯一的文件名，以及调用至少一次，调用以将资源文件写入到磁盘，然后调用关闭此文件。To create a.resx file, create a with a unique file name, call at least once, call to write the resources file to disk, and then call to close the file. 调用隐式将如果所需的文件。Calling will implicitly the file if required. 不在相同的顺序添加一定是写入资源。The resources are not necessarily written in the same order they were added. 有关格式一个.resx 文件的详细信息，请参阅[使用.resx 文件以编程方式](~/docs/framework/resources/working-with-resx-files-programmatically.md)。For more information on the format of a.resx file, see [Working with .resx Files Programmatically](~/docs/framework/resources/working-with-resx-files-programmatically.md). > [!NOTE] > 此类包含一个链接要求和继承要求在类级别应用于所有成员。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 一个直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为.resx 文件`CarResources.resx`六个字符串、 图标和两个应用程序定义的对象存储 (两个`Automobile`对象)。The following example creates a .resx file named `CarResources.resx` that stores six strings, an icon, and two application-defined objects (two `Automobile` objects). 请注意，本示例中定义并实例化的 `Automobile` 类使用 属性进行标记。Note that the `Automobile` class, which is defined and instantiated in the example, is tagged with the attribute. [!code-csharp[conceptual.resources.resx#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.resources.resx/cs/create1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[conceptual.resources.resx#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.resources.resx/vb/create1.vb#1)]

for full trust for inheritors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 方法关闭指定为参数的流。The method closes the stream you specify as a parameter. 若要写入到流未关闭流资源，必须使用方法。To write the resource to the stream without closing the stream, you must use the method.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，它将资源写入到指定文件中。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes the resources to the specified file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建`filename`如果它不存在，并将其覆盖，如果是这样。This constructor creates `filename` if it does not exist and overwrites it if it does. 如果`filename`包括的目录路径的完整路径必须存在或构造函数引发异常。If `filename` includes a directory path, the full path must exist or the constructor throws a exception.

span.span: The directory specified in does not exist.

summary.span: 通过此委托，可以使用限定的程序集名称以面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 之前的 .NET Framework 版本编写资源程序集。

span.span: This delegate enables resource assemblies to be written that target versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] by using qualified assembly names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual Studio 和 MSBuild 应创建面向版本之前的.NET Framework 的应用程序的资源时使用此构造函数[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]。Visual Studio and MSBuild use this constructor when you create resources for an application that target versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].

span.span: Adds a named resource specified as an object to the list of resources to write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会将资源写直到调用。The resource is not written until is called. 已添加的资源必须是可序列化。The resource that was added must be serializable. 如果要添加的资源是一个字符串，则将其编写为一个字符串;否则为该资源被序列化，并以二进制格式存储。If the resource being added is a string, it is written as a string; otherwise, the resource is serialized and stored in a binary format. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为.resx 文件`CarResources.resx`六个字符串、 图标和两个应用程序定义的对象存储 (两个`Automobile`对象)。The following example creates a .resx file named `CarResources.resx` that stores six strings, an icon, and two application-defined objects (two `Automobile` objects). 若要存储图标并`Automobile`对象，它将调用方法。To store the icon and the `Automobile` objects, it calls the method. 请注意，本示例中定义并实例化的 `Automobile` 类使用 属性进行标记。Note that the `Automobile` class, which is defined and instantiated in the example, is tagged with the attribute. [!code-csharp[conceptual.resources.resx#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.resources.resx/cs/create1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[conceptual.resources.resx#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.resources.resx/vb/create1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用方法，如有必要之前释放托管和非托管的系统资源。The method calls the method, if necessary, before releasing managed and unmanaged system resources. 调用允许使用的系统资源重新分配用于其他目的。Calling allows the system resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用方法，如有必要之前释放托管和非托管的系统资源。The method calls the method, if necessary, before releasing managed and unmanaged system resources. 调用此方法由公共方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅和。

span.span: For more information about and , see and .

summary.span: 此成员重写 方法。

span.span: This member overrides the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Generate() cil managed
abstract member Generate : unit -> unit override this.Generate : unit -> unit

summary.span: 将所有由 方法添加的资源均写入到输出文件或流中。

span.span: Writes all resources added by the method to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将资源写入到输出文件或流。The method writes the resources to the output file or stream. 如果你想要写入的资源，并关闭输出文件或流，调用方法。If you want to write the resources as well as close the output file or stream, call the method. 可以一次调用方法。The method can be called only once. 在调用方法中，所有以外的其他方法将引发异常。After calling the method, all methods other than will throw an exception.

span.span: The resource has already been saved.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ResMimeType As String

summary.span: 指定 XML 资源的内容类型。

span.span: Specifies the content type of an XML resource.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ResourceSchema As String

summary.span: 指定写入 XML 文件时使用的架构。

span.span: Specifies the schema to use in writing the XML file.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该架构提供有关如何进行编码的资源基于正在写入的资源类型的详细信息。The schema provides details on how to encode the resources based on the type of resource being written.

span.span: Specifies the content type for a SOAP object.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Version As String

summary.span: 指定 XML 输出所符合的架构的版本。

span.span: Specifies the version of the schema that the XML output conforms to.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.
